channel.title: Please can i be an admin on a server
channel.description: hi ive been playing moparscape for about a year though i never played it yhat much now i play it all the time but have never even been a mod please could some on be genrous enough to give me a admin spot i usally play as reece or reece 1. ;D

item.title: Please can i be an admin on a server
item.dc:creator: @lil_wizzy lil wizzy
item.description:
@lil_wizzy wrote:

reece, you do know its against the rules to ask for admin/mod right? you have to work for admin/mod on servers and if the owner feels you should recieve it you shall.

Read full topic
item.source: Please can i be an admin on a server
